article_text:
Papa John PIZZA TRAITOR!!!

EXCLUSIVE

is like Benedict Arnold slathered in marinara sauce!We got PJ -- aka-- chowing down on the competition at the Sundance Film Festival in Park City, Utah.A far cry from the chain, the pie was served up at the uber-fancy St. Regis Hotel.But his real transgression is the method ... HE ATE IT WITH A FORK!Better pizza. Better explain!

article_metadata.description: PJ's finally responded, and says ... he did not fork it up.Papa John is like Benedict Arnold slathered in marinara sauce!We got PJ -- aka John Schnatter…
